name: Catbox Osciloscope
description: Catbox Osciloscope is a robotic marvel that combines the classic charm of a vintage osciloscope with the sleek agility of a cat. Equipped with cat-like arms and legs, this robot is a part of the WebtrES club, known for their exceptional skills in web development and electronic engineering. Its screen, resembling a cat's face, displays intricate waveforms and data with precision. To top it off, Catbox Osciloscope sports a pair of stylish shades, adding a touch of attitude to its already impressive design.
